info.description:
This is a sample server Petstore server.
You can find out more about Swagger at
[http://swagger.io](http://swagger.io) or on [irc.freenode.net, #swagger](http://swagger.io/irc/).
For this sample, you can use the api key `special-key` to test the authorization filters.
# Introduction
This API is documented in **OpenAPI format** and is based on
[Petstore sample](http://petstore.swagger.io/) provided by [swagger.io](http://swagger.io) team.
It was **extended** to illustrate features of [generator-openapi-repo](https://github.com/Rebilly/generator-openapi-repo)
tool and [ReDoc](https://github.com/Redocly/redoc) documentation. In addition to standard
OpenAPI syntax we use a few [vendor extensions](https://github.com/Redocly/redoc/blob/master/docs/redoc-vendor-extensions.md).
# OpenAPI Specification
This API is documented in **OpenAPI format** and is based on
[Petstore sample](http://petstore.swagger.io/) provided by [swagger.io](http://swagger.io) team.
It was **extended** to illustrate features of [generator-openapi-repo](https://github.com/Rebilly/generator-openapi-repo)
tool and [ReDoc](https://github.com/Redocly/redoc) documentation. In addition to standard
OpenAPI syntax we use a few [vendor extensions](https://github.com/Redocly/redoc/blob/master/docs/redoc-vendor-extensions.md).
# Cross-Origin Resource Sharing
This API features Cross-Origin Resource Sharing (CORS) implemented in compliance with  [W3C spec](https://www.w3.org/TR/cors/).
And that allows cross-domain communication from the browser.
All responses have a wildcard same-origin which makes them completely public and accessible to everyone, including any code on any site.
# Authentication
Petstore offers two forms of authentication:
  - API Key
  - OAuth2

OAuth2 - an open protocol to allow secure authorization in a simple
and standard method from web, mobile and desktop applications.
<!-- ReDoc-Inject: <security-definitions> -->
info.title: Swagger Petstore

externalDocs.description: Find out how to create Github repo for your OpenAPI spec.

petstore_auth.description:
Get access to data while protecting your account credentials.
OAuth2 is also a safer and more secure way to give you access.

api_key.description: For this sample, you can use the api key `special-key` to test the authorization filters.
api_key.name: api_key

post.summary: Add a new pet to the store
post.description: Add new pet to the store inventory.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Pet object that needs to be added to the store

x-code-samples.source:
curl --request POST \
  --url http://petstore.swagger.io/v2/pet \
  --header 'accept: application/xml' \
  --header 'authorization: Bearer REPLACE_BEARER_TOKEN' \
  --header 'content-type: application/json' \
  --data '{"id":0,"category":{"id":0,"name":"string","sub":{"prop1":"string"}},"name":"Guru","photoUrls":["string"],"tags":[{"id":0,"name":"string"}],"status":"available","petType":"string"}'

<?php

$request = new HttpRequest();
$request->setUrl('http://petstore.swagger.io/v2/pet');
$request->setMethod(HTTP_METH_POST);

$request->setHeaders(array(
  'accept' => 'application/xml',
  'content-type' => 'application/json',
  'authorization' => 'Bearer REPLACE_BEARER_TOKEN'
));

$request->setBody('{"id":0,"category":{"id":0,"name":"string","sub":{"prop1":"string"}},"name":"Guru","photoUrls":["string"],"tags":[{"id":0,"name":"string"}],"status":"available","petType":"string"}');

try {
  $response = $request->send();

  echo $response->getBody();
} catch (HttpException $ex) {
  echo $ex;
}

HttpResponse<String> response = Unirest.post("http://petstore.swagger.io/v2/pet")
  .header("accept", "application/xml")
  .header("content-type", "application/json")
  .header("authorization", "Bearer REPLACE_BEARER_TOKEN")
  .body("{\"id\":0,\"category\":{\"id\":0,\"name\":\"string\",\"sub\":{\"prop1\":\"string\"}},\"name\":\"Guru\",\"photoUrls\":[\"string\"],\"tags\":[{\"id\":0,\"name\":\"string\"}],\"status\":\"available\",\"petType\":\"string\"}")
  .asString();

package main

import (
	"fmt"
	"strings"
	"net/http"
	"io/ioutil"
)

func main() {

	url := "http://petstore.swagger.io/v2/pet"

	payload := strings.NewReader("{\"id\":0,\"category\":{\"id\":0,\"name\":\"string\",\"sub\":{\"prop1\":\"string\"}},\"name\":\"Guru\",\"photoUrls\":[\"string\"],\"tags\":[{\"id\":0,\"name\":\"string\"}],\"status\":\"available\",\"petType\":\"string\"}")

	req, _ := http.NewRequest("POST", url, payload)

	req.Header.Add("accept", "application/xml")
	req.Header.Add("content-type", "application/json")
	req.Header.Add("authorization", "Bearer REPLACE_BEARER_TOKEN")

	res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)

	defer res.Body.Close()
	body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

	fmt.Println(res)
	fmt.Println(string(body))

}

import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPConnection("petstore.swagger.io")

payload = "{\"id\":0,\"category\":{\"id\":0,\"name\":\"string\",\"sub\":{\"prop1\":\"string\"}},\"name\":\"Guru\",\"photoUrls\":[\"string\"],\"tags\":[{\"id\":0,\"name\":\"string\"}],\"status\":\"available\",\"petType\":\"string\"}"

headers = {
    'accept': "application/xml",
    'content-type': "application/json",
    'authorization': "Bearer REPLACE_BEARER_TOKEN"
    }

conn.request("POST", "/v2/pet", payload, headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

require 'uri'
require 'net/http'

url = URI("http://petstore.swagger.io/v2/pet")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)

request = Net::HTTP::Post.new(url)
request["accept"] = 'application/xml'
request["content-type"] = 'application/json'
request["authorization"] = 'Bearer REPLACE_BEARER_TOKEN'
request.body = "{\"id\":0,\"category\":{\"id\":0,\"name\":\"string\",\"sub\":{\"prop1\":\"string\"}},\"name\":\"Guru\",\"photoUrls\":[\"string\"],\"tags\":[{\"id\":0,\"name\":\"string\"}],\"status\":\"available\",\"petType\":\"string\"}"

response = http.request(request)
puts response.read_body

parameters.name: petId
parameters.description: ID of pet to return

x-code-samples.source:
curl --request GET \
  --url http://petstore.swagger.io/v2/pet/%7BpetId%7D \
  --header 'api_key: REPLACE_KEY_VALUE' \
  --header 'content-type: application/json'

<?php

$request = new HttpRequest();
$request->setUrl('http://petstore.swagger.io/v2/pet/%7BpetId%7D');
$request->setMethod(HTTP_METH_GET);

$request->setHeaders(array(
  'content-type' => 'application/json',
  'api_key' => 'REPLACE_KEY_VALUE'
));

try {
  $response = $request->send();

  echo $response->getBody();
} catch (HttpException $ex) {
  echo $ex;
}

HttpResponse<String> response = Unirest.get("http://petstore.swagger.io/v2/pet/%7BpetId%7D")
  .header("content-type", "application/json")
  .header("api_key", "REPLACE_KEY_VALUE")
  .asString();

package main

import (
	"fmt"
	"net/http"
	"io/ioutil"
)

func main() {

	url := "http://petstore.swagger.io/v2/pet/%7BpetId%7D"

	req, _ := http.NewRequest("GET", url, nil)

	req.Header.Add("content-type", "application/json")
	req.Header.Add("api_key", "REPLACE_KEY_VALUE")

	res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)

	defer res.Body.Close()
	body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

	fmt.Println(res)
	fmt.Println(string(body))

}

conn = http.client.HTTPConnection("petstore.swagger.io")

    'content-type': "application/json",
    'api_key': "REPLACE_KEY_VALUE"
    }

conn.request("GET", "/v2/pet/%7BpetId%7D", headers=headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

request = Net::HTTP::Get.new(url)
request["content-type"] = 'application/json'
request["api_key"] = 'REPLACE_KEY_VALUE'

response = http.request(request)
puts response.read_body

x-code-samples.source:
curl --request POST \
  --url http://petstore.swagger.io/v2/pet/%7BpetId%7D/uploadImage \
  --header 'accept: multipart/form-data' \
  --header 'authorization: Bearer REPLACE_BEARER_TOKEN' \
  --header 'content-type: application/json'

<?php

$request = new HttpRequest();
$request->setUrl('http://petstore.swagger.io/v2/pet/%7BpetId%7D/uploadImage');
$request->setMethod(HTTP_METH_POST);

$request->setHeaders(array(
  'accept' => 'multipart/form-data',
  'content-type' => 'application/json',
  'authorization' => 'Bearer REPLACE_BEARER_TOKEN'
));

try {
  $response = $request->send();

  echo $response->getBody();
} catch (HttpException $ex) {
  echo $ex;
}

HttpResponse<String> response = Unirest.post("http://petstore.swagger.io/v2/pet/%7BpetId%7D/uploadImage")
  .header("accept", "multipart/form-data")
  .header("content-type", "application/json")
  .header("authorization", "Bearer REPLACE_BEARER_TOKEN")
  .asString();

package main

import (
	"fmt"
	"net/http"
	"io/ioutil"
)

func main() {

	url := "http://petstore.swagger.io/v2/pet/%7BpetId%7D/uploadImage"

	req, _ := http.NewRequest("POST", url, nil)

	req.Header.Add("accept", "multipart/form-data")
	req.Header.Add("content-type", "application/json")
	req.Header.Add("authorization", "Bearer REPLACE_BEARER_TOKEN")

	res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)

	defer res.Body.Close()
	body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

	fmt.Println(res)
	fmt.Println(string(body))

}

    }

res = conn.getresponse()

get.description: Multiple status values can be provided with comma separated strings

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Status values that need to be considered for filter

x-code-samples.source:
curl --request GET \
  --url 'http://petstore.swagger.io/v2/pet/findByStatus?status=SOME_ARRAY_VALUE' \
  --header 'authorization: Bearer REPLACE_BEARER_TOKEN' \
  --header 'content-type: application/json'

<?php

$request = new HttpRequest();
$request->setUrl('http://petstore.swagger.io/v2/pet/findByStatus');
$request->setMethod(HTTP_METH_GET);

$request->setQueryData(array(
  'status' => 'SOME_ARRAY_VALUE'
));

$request->setHeaders(array(
  'content-type' => 'application/json',
  'authorization' => 'Bearer REPLACE_BEARER_TOKEN'
));

try {
  $response = $request->send();

  echo $response->getBody();
} catch (HttpException $ex) {
  echo $ex;
}

HttpResponse<String> response = Unirest.get("http://petstore.swagger.io/v2/pet/findByStatus?status=SOME_ARRAY_VALUE")
  .header("content-type", "application/json")
  .header("authorization", "Bearer REPLACE_BEARER_TOKEN")
  .asString();

package main

import (
	"fmt"
	"net/http"
	"io/ioutil"
)

func main() {

	url := "http://petstore.swagger.io/v2/pet/findByStatus?status=SOME_ARRAY_VALUE"

	req, _ := http.NewRequest("GET", url, nil)

	req.Header.Add("content-type", "application/json")
	req.Header.Add("authorization", "Bearer REPLACE_BEARER_TOKEN")

	res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)

	defer res.Body.Close()
	body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

	fmt.Println(res)
	fmt.Println(string(body))

}

get.description: Multiple tags can be provided with comma separated strings. Use tag1, tag2, tag3 for testing.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Tags to filter by

x-code-samples.source:
curl --request GET \
  --url 'http://petstore.swagger.io/v2/pet/findByTags?tags=SOME_ARRAY_VALUE' \
  --header 'authorization: Bearer REPLACE_BEARER_TOKEN' \
  --header 'content-type: application/json'

$request->setUrl('http://petstore.swagger.io/v2/pet/findByTags');
$request->setMethod(HTTP_METH_GET);

$request->setQueryData(array(
  'tags' => 'SOME_ARRAY_VALUE'
));

$request->setHeaders(array(
  'content-type' => 'application/json',
  'authorization' => 'Bearer REPLACE_BEARER_TOKEN'
));

try {

  echo $response->getBody();
} catch (HttpException $ex) {

}

  .header("content-type", "application/json")
  .header("authorization", "Bearer REPLACE_BEARER_TOKEN")
  .asString();

package main

import (
	"fmt"
	"net/http"
	"io/ioutil"
)

func main() {

	url := "http://petstore.swagger.io/v2/pet/findByTags?tags=SOME_ARRAY_VALUE"

	req.Header.Add("content-type", "application/json")
	req.Header.Add("authorization", "Bearer REPLACE_BEARER_TOKEN")

	defer res.Body.Close()
	body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

	fmt.Println(res)

}

post.summary: Place an order for a pet

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: order placed for purchasing the pet

x-code-samples.source:
curl --request POST \
  --url http://petstore.swagger.io/v2/store/order \
  --header 'content-type: application/json' \
  --data '{"id":0,"petId":0,"quantity":1,"shipDate":"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z","status":"placed","complete":false}'

<?php

$request = new HttpRequest();
$request->setUrl('http://petstore.swagger.io/v2/store/order');
$request->setMethod(HTTP_METH_POST);

$request->setHeaders(array(
  'content-type' => 'application/json'
));

$request->setBody('{"id":0,"petId":0,"quantity":1,"shipDate":"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z","status":"placed","complete":false}');

try {
  $response = $request->send();

  echo $response->getBody();
} catch (HttpException $ex) {
  echo $ex;
}

HttpResponse<String> response = Unirest.post("http://petstore.swagger.io/v2/store/order")
  .header("content-type", "application/json")
  .body("{\"id\":0,\"petId\":0,\"quantity\":1,\"shipDate\":\"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z\",\"status\":\"placed\",\"complete\":false}")
  .asString();

package main

import (
	"fmt"
	"strings"
	"net/http"
	"io/ioutil"
)

func main() {

	url := "http://petstore.swagger.io/v2/store/order"

	payload := strings.NewReader("{\"id\":0,\"petId\":0,\"quantity\":1,\"shipDate\":\"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z\",\"status\":\"placed\",\"complete\":false}")

	req, _ := http.NewRequest("POST", url, payload)

	req.Header.Add("content-type", "application/json")

	res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)

	defer res.Body.Close()
	body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

	fmt.Println(res)
	fmt.Println(string(body))

}

import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPConnection("petstore.swagger.io")

payload = "{\"id\":0,\"petId\":0,\"quantity\":1,\"shipDate\":\"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z\",\"status\":\"placed\",\"complete\":false}"

headers = { 'content-type': "application/json" }

conn.request("POST", "/v2/store/order", payload, headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

require 'uri'
require 'net/http'

url = URI("http://petstore.swagger.io/v2/store/order")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)

request = Net::HTTP::Post.new(url)
request["content-type"] = 'application/json'
request.body = "{\"id\":0,\"petId\":0,\"quantity\":1,\"shipDate\":\"2019-08-24T14:15:22Z\",\"status\":\"placed\",\"complete\":false}"

response = http.request(request)
puts response.read_body

$request->setBody('[{"id":0,"username":"John78","firstName":"John","lastName":"Smith","email":"john.smith@example.com","password":"drowssaP123","phone":"+1-202-555-0192","userStatus":0}]');

try {
  $response = $request->send();

  echo $response->getBody();
} catch (HttpException $ex) {
  echo $ex;
}

HttpResponse<String> response = Unirest.post("http://petstore.swagger.io/v2/user/createWithList")
  .header("content-type", "application/json")
  .body("[{\"id\":0,\"username\":\"John78\",\"firstName\":\"John\",\"lastName\":\"Smith\",\"email\":\"john.smith@example.com\",\"password\":\"drowssaP123\",\"phone\":\"+1-202-555-0192\",\"userStatus\":0}]")
  .asString();

package main

import (
	"fmt"
	"strings"
	"net/http"
	"io/ioutil"
)

func main() {

	url := "http://petstore.swagger.io/v2/user/createWithList"

	payload := strings.NewReader("[{\"id\":0,\"username\":\"John78\",\"firstName\":\"John\",\"lastName\":\"Smith\",\"email\":\"john.smith@example.com\",\"password\":\"drowssaP123\",\"phone\":\"+1-202-555-0192\",\"userStatus\":0}]")

	req, _ := http.NewRequest("POST", url, payload)

	req.Header.Add("content-type", "application/json")

	res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)

	defer res.Body.Close()
	body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

	fmt.Println(res)
	fmt.Println(string(body))

}

import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPConnection("petstore.swagger.io")

payload = "[{\"id\":0,\"username\":\"John78\",\"firstName\":\"John\",\"lastName\":\"Smith\",\"email\":\"john.smith@example.com\",\"password\":\"drowssaP123\",\"phone\":\"+1-202-555-0192\",\"userStatus\":0}]"

headers = { 'content-type': "application/json" }

conn.request("POST", "/v2/user/createWithList", payload, headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

require 'uri'
require 'net/http'

url = URI("http://petstore.swagger.io/v2/user/createWithList")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)

request = Net::HTTP::Post.new(url)
request["content-type"] = 'application/json'
request.body = "[{\"id\":0,\"username\":\"John78\",\"firstName\":\"John\",\"lastName\":\"Smith\",\"email\":\"john.smith@example.com\",\"password\":\"drowssaP123\",\"phone\":\"+1-202-555-0192\",\"userStatus\":0}]"

response = http.request(request)
puts response.read_body

x-code-samples.source:
curl --request GET \
  --url 'http://petstore.swagger.io/v2/user/login?username=SOME_STRING_VALUE&password=SOME_STRING_VALUE' \
  --header 'content-type: application/json'

<?php

$request = new HttpRequest();
$request->setUrl('http://petstore.swagger.io/v2/user/login');
$request->setMethod(HTTP_METH_GET);

$request->setQueryData(array(
  'username' => 'SOME_STRING_VALUE',
  'password' => 'SOME_STRING_VALUE'
));

$request->setHeaders(array(
  'content-type' => 'application/json'
));

try {
  $response = $request->send();

  echo $response->getBody();
} catch (HttpException $ex) {
  echo $ex;
}

package main

import (
	"fmt"
	"net/http"
	"io/ioutil"
)

func main() {

	url := "http://petstore.swagger.io/v2/user/login?username=SOME_STRING_VALUE&password=SOME_STRING_VALUE"

	req, _ := http.NewRequest("GET", url, nil)

	req.Header.Add("content-type", "application/json")

	res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)

	defer res.Body.Close()
	body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

	fmt.Println(res)
	fmt.Println(string(body))

}

import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPConnection("petstore.swagger.io")

headers = { 'content-type': "application/json" }

data = res.read()

get.summary: Logs out current logged in user session

  --url http://petstore.swagger.io/v2/user/logout \
  --header 'content-type: application/json'

<?php

$request = new HttpRequest();
$request->setUrl('http://petstore.swagger.io/v2/user/logout');
$request->setMethod(HTTP_METH_GET);

$request->setHeaders(array(
  'content-type' => 'application/json'
));

try {

  echo $response->getBody();
} catch (HttpException $ex) {

}
